sub_title: Group General Counsel Nutrition Business at Unilever
summary:
Aug 2022 - till date - Group General Counsel Nutrition at Unilever

Jan 2021 - July 2022- General Counsel and Vice President SEAT and Vietnam and Global General Counsel of Unilever International and Unilever Asia Pte Ltd (Unilever’s Singapore hub). A double hat role, managing legal & governance issues, risk management &  compliance with laws & policies for SEAT countries, Vietnam, UAPL (Singapore Hub) and global business of Unilever International spread across 100 countries.

Dec 2016 - Dec 2020 : Leading M&A agenda for the region, instrumental in setting up JV in Myanmar and leading acquisition of Carver Korea by Unilever in Korea (Euro 2.2 B deal). Also working as General Counsel SEAT (Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, Myanmar, Cambodia and Laos) from 2020 and General Counsel for Unilever International business from 2019 onwards.

Nov 2013 - Nov 2016 : Global Legal Operations Director based out of London. Part of the Legal Management Team of Unilever and working closely with leadership members of Unilever legal and the CLO in driving the strategy and vision of Legal.

2013 : Legal Director - South East Asia & Australasia (SEAA) based out of Singapore.
Leading Competition Law work for Unilever in Asia (South Asia, North Asia and SEAA), lead legal business partner for Unilever International business and business partnering operations for global office in Singapore and Global CD (Sales) teams .  

2011 - 2012 : Corporate Counsel for South East Asia Australasia, North Asia and UAPL. Business Partnering Customer Development Regional Leadership Team (CDRLT) for D&E (Developing & Emerging) geographies in Unilever. Competition Law compliance, Assisting in M&A transactions . 

2009 - 2010 : Business partner to Supply Management / Procurement organisation for Unilever. Responsible for legal support, setting up and negotiations of procurement contracts. Also Business partnering the Cross Border Sourcing & "Deliver" function (logistics & warehousing) 

2002 – Oct 2008: Worked in various roles in India for Unilever. Took active role in business partnering CD, Supply Chain, Tax and Finance functions. Pro-active support to Business, Units, Channels and functions and also Litigation Dispute. Was seconded for 6 months to Singapore for a Supply Chain transformation project in 2007.
